mapper.sql: ETP_NUM, ETP_EMAIL, ETP_OWNER, ETP_SUPERCLASS, ETP_ADDRESS, ETP_ZIPCODE, ETP_TITLE, ETP_START_HOUR, ETP_END_HOUR, ETP_PHONE, ETP_MALE_STAFF, ETP_FEMALE_STAFF, ETP_CAPACITY, ETP_RSV_DEADLINE, ETP_SELF_NOTIFICATION, ETP_CST_NOTIFICATION, ETP_TEMPLATE_TYPE, ETP_THEME_TYPE, ETP_MAP_ADDRESS, ETP_DIRECTION, ETP_SVC_OFFERED, ETP_SUBCLASS, ETP_SPECIALIZE, ETP_DESCRIPTION, ETP_STATUS
mapper.select: select * from ENTERPRISE where ETP_NUM = #{etpNum}
select * from ENTERPRISE where ETP_EMAIL = #{etpEmail}
select e.*, w.* from ENTERPRISE e, WORKING_DAYS w where e.ETP_NUM = #{etpNum} and e.etp_num = w.etp_num
select e.*, w.* from ENTERPRISE e, WORKING_DAYS w where e.ETP_EMAIL = #{etpEmail} and e.etp_email = w.etp_email
mapper.insert: insert into HR.ENTERPRISE (ETP_NUM, ETP_EMAIL, ETP_OWNER, ETP_SUPERCLASS, ETP_ADDRESS, ETP_ZIPCODE, ETP_TITLE, ETP_START_HOUR, ETP_END_HOUR, ETP_PHONE, ETP_MALE_STAFF, ETP_FEMALE_STAFF, ETP_CAPACITY, ETP_RSV_DEADLINE, ETP_SELF_NOTIFICATION, ETP_CST_NOTIFICATION, ETP_TEMPLATE_TYPE, ETP_THEME_TYPE, ETP_MAP_ADDRESS, ETP_DIRECTION, ETP_SVC_OFFERED, ETP_SUBCLASS, ETP_SPECIALIZE, ETP_DESCRIPTION, ETP_STATUS ) values (#{etpNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etpEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etpOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etpSuperclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etpAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etpZipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etpTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etpStartHour,jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=model.mapper.typehandler.LocalTimeHandler}, #{etpEndHour,jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=model.mapper.typehandler.LocalTimeHandler}, #{etpPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etpMaleStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{etpFemaleStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{etpCapacity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{etpRsvDeadline,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{etpSelfNotification,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{etpCstNotification,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{etpTemplateType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{etpMapAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etpDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etpSvcOffered,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etpSubclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etpSpecialize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etpDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etpStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

insert into HR.ENTERPRISE
ETP_NUM,
ETP_EMAIL,
ETP_OWNER,
ETP_SUPERCLASS,
ETP_ADDRESS,
ETP_ZIPCODE,
ETP_TITLE,
ETP_START_HOUR,
ETP_END_HOUR,
ETP_PHONE,
ETP_MALE_STAFF,
ETP_FEMALE_STAFF,
ETP_CAPACITY,
ETP_RSV_DEADLINE,
ETP_SELF_NOTIFICATION,
ETP_CST_NOTIFICATION,
ETP_TEMPLATE_TYPE,
ETP_THEME_TYPE,
ETP_MAP_ADDRESS,
ETP_DIRECTION,
ETP_SVC_OFFERED,
ETP_SUBCLASS,
ETP_SPECIALIZE,
ETP_DESCRIPTION,
ETP_STATUS,
#{etpNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{etpEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{etpOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{etpSuperclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{etpAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{etpZipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{etpTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{etpStartHour,jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=model.mapper.typehandler.LocalTimeHandler},
#{etpEndHour,jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=model.mapper.typehandler.LocalTimeHandler},
#{etpPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{etpMaleStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{etpFemaleStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{etpCapacity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{etpRsvDeadline,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{etpSelfNotification,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{etpCstNotification,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{etpTemplateType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.update:
update HR.ENTERPRISE
ETP_OWNER = #{etpOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ETP_SUPERCLASS = #{etpSuperclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ETP_ADDRESS = #{etpAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ETP_ZIPCODE = #{etpZipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ETP_TITLE = #{etpTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ETP_START_HOUR = #{etpStartHour,jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=model.mapper.typehandler.LocalTimeHandler},
ETP_END_HOUR = #{etpEndHour,jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=model.mapper.typehandler.LocalTimeHandler},
ETP_PHONE = #{etpPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ETP_MALE_STAFF = #{etpMaleStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ETP_FEMALE_STAFF = #{etpFemaleStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ETP_CAPACITY = #{etpCapacity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ETP_RSV_DEADLINE = #{etpRsvDeadline,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ETP_SELF_NOTIFICATION = #{etpSelfNotification,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ETP_CST_NOTIFICATION = #{etpCstNotification,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ETP_TEMPLATE_TYPE = #{etpTemplateType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ETP_THEME_TYPE = #{etpThemeType},
ETP_MAP_ADDRESS = #{etpMapAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ETP_DIRECTION = #{etpDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ETP_SVC_OFFERED = #{etpSvcOffered,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ETP_SUBCLASS = #{etpSubclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ETP_SPECIALIZE = #{etpSpecialize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ETP_DESCRIPTION = #{etpDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ETP_STATUS = #{etpStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ETP_NUM = #{etpNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update HR.ENTERPRISE set ETP_OWNER = #{etpOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETP_SUPERCLASS = #{etpSuperclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETP_ADDRESS = #{etpAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETP_ZIPCODE = #{etpZipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETP_TITLE = #{etpTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETP_START_HOUR = #{etpStartHour,jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=model.mapper.typehandler.LocalTimeHandler}, ETP_END_HOUR = #{etpEndHour,jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=model.mapper.typehandler.LocalTimeHandler}, ETP_PHONE = #{etpPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETP_MALE_STAFF = #{etpMaleStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ETP_FEMALE_STAFF = #{etpFemaleStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ETP_CAPACITY = #{etpCapacity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ETP_RSV_DEADLINE = #{etpRsvDeadline,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ETP_SELF_NOTIFICATION = #{etpSelfNotification,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ETP_CST_NOTIFICATION = #{etpCstNotification,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ETP_TEMPLATE_TYPE = #{etpTemplateType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ETP_THEME_TYPE = #{etpThemeType}, ETP_MAP_ADDRESS = #{etpMapAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETP_DIRECTION = #{etpDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETP_SVC_OFFERED = #{etpSvcOffered,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETP_SUBCLASS = #{etpSubclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETP_SPECIALIZE = #{etpSpecialize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETP_DESCRIPTION = #{etpDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETP_STATUS = #{etpStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ETP_NUM = #{etpNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ETP_EMAIL = #{etpEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from service where etp_num = #{etpNum} and svc_category = #{svcCategory}
select * from enterprise where etp_status != 0
select * from review where etp_num = #{etpNum}
select * from photo_location where etp_num = #{etpNum} and pht_usage = 'gal'

select pht_address from (select rownum, pht_address from (select photo_num, pht_address from photo_location where etp_num = #{etpNum} and pht_usage = 'info' order by pht_upload_date desc) where rownum=1)photo

select pht_address from (select rownum, pht_address from (select photo_num, pht_address from photo_location where etp_num = #{etpNum} and pht_usage = 'logo' order by pht_upload_date desc) where rownum=1)photo
mapper.update: update enterprise set etp_description = #{etpDescription} where etp_num = #{etpNum}
mapper.select: select * from component where etp_num = #{etpNum} and component_id = #{componentId}
select * from component where etp_num = #{etpNum}
mapper.update: update component set component_width = 0, component_height = 0, component_pos_x = 0, component_pos_y = 0 where etp_num = #{etpNum}
update ENTERPRISE set etp_Template_Type = #{etpTemplateType} where etp_num = #{etpNum}
mapper.select: select ETP_NUM,ETP_SUPERCLASS,ETP_OWNER,ETP_EMAIL,ETP_ADDRESS,ETP_ZIPCODE,ETP_TITLE,ETP_PHONE, ETP_DESCRIPTION,ETP_SPECIALIZE,SUBSTR(ETP_ADDRESS,1,2) addr1,ETP_START_HOUR,ETP_END_HOUR from hr.enterprise where ETP_SUPERCLASS like '%'||#{searchLanguage}||'%' or ETP_SUBCLASS like '%'||#{searchLanguage}||'%' or ETP_OWNER like '%'||#{searchLanguage}||'%' or ETP_EMAIL like '%'||#{searchLanguage}||'%' or ETP_ADDRESS like '%'||#{searchLanguage}||'%' or ETP_ZIPCODE like '%'||#{searchLanguage}||'%' or ETP_TITLE like '%'||#{searchLanguage}||'%' or ETP_PHONE like '%'||#{searchLanguage}||'%' or ETP_DESCRIPTION like '%'||#{searchLanguage}||'%' or ETP_SPECIALIZE like '%'||#{searchLanguage}||'%' order by ETP_TITLE ASC

select * from hr.enterprise where
ETP_SPECIALIZE like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ETP_SUBCLASS like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ETP_SUPERCLASS like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' or ETP_SUBCLASS like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' or ETP_TITLE like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' or ETP_DESCRIPTION like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' or ETP_SPECIALIZE like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ETP_ADDRESS like '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
order by etp_title ASC

select s.SALE_NUM, r.RSV_NUM, r.CST_EMAIL, v.SVC_TITLE, r.RSV_START_DATE, s.SALE_AMOUNT from SALE_RECORD s, RESERVATION r, SERVICE v, PAYMENT_RECORD p where r.RSV_NUM=p.RSV_NUM and p.PMT_NUM=s.PMT_NUM and r.SVC_NUM=v.SVC_NUM and r.ETP_EMAIL=#{loginEmail} order by r.RSV_START_DATE desc
select * from Enterprise where etp_num=#{etpNum}

select etp.etp_owner, etp.etp_email, etp.etp_phone, etp.etp_address, etp.etp_status, etp.etp_num, mem.mem_joined_date from Enterprise etp, member mem where etp.etp_email = mem.mem_email order by etp.etp_status, mem.mem_joined_date
mapper.update: update enterprise set etp_status=1 where etp_num=#{etpNum}
update enterprise set etp_status=2 where etp_num=#{etpNum}
mapper.select: select * from component where etp_num = #{etpNum}
select ETP_ADDRESS from ENTERPRISE where ETP_EMAIL = #{etpEmail}
select * from COUPON where etp_num = #{etpNum}
mapper.update: update COUPON set cpn_title=#{cpnTitle}, cpn_rate=#{cpnRate}, cpn_start_date=#{cpnStartDate}, cpn_end_date=#{cpnEndDate} where cpn_num=#{cpnNum}
mapper.select: select * from COUPON where cpn_num = #{cpnNum} and cpn_code = #{cpnCode}
select pht_address from photo_location where pht_usage like 'reg' and etp_num = #{value}

select * from reservation r, service s where r.svc_num = #{svcNum} and r.cst_email =#{cstEmail} and to_char(r.rsv_start_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd hh24') = to_char(#{rsvStartDate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd hh24') and r.rsv_title = #{rsvTitle} and s.svc_num = r.svc_num
select pht_address from photo_location where pht_usage like 'info' and etp_num = #{value}
select pht_address from photo_location where pht_usage like 'logo' and etp_num = #{value}
mapper.update: update enterprise set etp_template_type = #{etpTemplateType}, etp_theme_type = #{etpThemeType} where etp_num = #{etpNum}
mapper.delete: insert into notification(ntf_num, cst_email, etp_num, etp_email, ntf_message, ntf_time, ntf_read) values(notification_seq.nextval, #{cstEmail}, #{etpNum}, #{etpEmail}, #{ntfMessage}, #{ntfTime}, #{ntfRead})
mapper.select: select * from notification where etp_num = #{value} and ntf_read = 0 order by ntf_time desc
select * from notification where etp_num = #{value} order by ntf_time desc
mapper.update: update notification set ntf_read = 1 where ntf_num= #{value}
